duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead technical requirements gatherings and establish approaches for project methodology.
Communicate technical processes to non-technical business leaders and non-technical business requirements to technical process owners.
Gather and organize large amounts of data for ingestion into Client systems.
Contribute to the design and development of data exchange infrastructure.
Create a plan to accomplish business requirements using technology.
Install, configure, test, and place into production integrations with Clients.
Adhere to documented departmental and corporate standards.
Assist in performing other related duties and special projects as required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in related field required (Master's preferred)
